product.name: Dayring
product.slogan: Visualize a guilt-free and grounded day

requirements.description: Remove fade checkbox functionality for wake and sleep time
steps: Open the configure window
Locate the fade checkbox for wake time and sleep time
Remove the fade checkbox from the UI
Verify wake and sleep times no longer expose fade-related controls
Confirm wake and sleep rendering no longer depends on a fade toggle

requirements.description: Ensure task gradient blending extends 15 minutes before start time and 15 minutes after end time
steps: Create a task with a defined start and end time
Enable soft fade for the task
Render the task annulus
Verify the fade-in gradient begins exactly 15 minutes before the task start time
Verify the fade-out gradient ends exactly 15 minutes after the task end time
Confirm task color is fully opaque between start and end times

requirements.description: Improve keyboard navigation and time field behavior for task start and end times in configure window
steps: Focus the task start time hour input field
Type an hour value and press Tab
Verify focus moves to the minutes field
Press Tab again and verify focus moves to the AM/PM field
Press Up or Down to toggle AM/PM
Press Up in the hour field and verify it increments by 1 hour
Press Up in the minutes field and verify it increments by 15 minutes
Complete the start time entry
Verify focus automatically moves to the end time hour field

requirements.description: Correct AM/PM switching logic when adjusting wake and sleep times with arrow controls
steps: Set wake time to an AM hour
Use the up arrow to increment the hour until it passes 12
Verify the time switches from AM to PM at 12
Set sleep time to a PM hour
Use the up arrow to increment the hour until it passes 12
Verify the time switches from PM to AM at 12
Repeat using the down arrow and verify correct AM/PM switching

requirements.description: Application has modern, polished UI design
steps: Launch application
View onboarding screens
View Configure window
View annulus overlay
Verify all UI elements have consistent, modern styling
Verify visual polish (smooth animations, proper spacing, readable typography)
Install application on Windows
Launch application
Verify all features function correctly
Verify system tray integration works
Install application on macOS
Launch application
Verify all features function correctly
Verify menu bar/system tray integration works
Install application on Linux
Launch application
Verify all features function correctly
Verify system tray integration works

requirements.description: Ensure annulus opacity reaches 100% on hover regardless of configured base opacity
steps: Open the configure window
Set annulus opacity to 100% and verify normal rendering
Set annulus opacity to a value below 100%
Hover the cursor over the annulus
Observe annulus opacity during hover state
Verify the annulus opacity increases to exactly 100% on hover
Confirm hover behavior overrides configured opacity temporarily

requirements.description: Ensure hovered task name text is layered above 'X hrs remaining' text
steps: Create at least one task with a visible name
Hover over the task segment on the annulus
Trigger the task name display
Observe layering between the task name text and 'X hrs remaining' text
Verify the task name is rendered above (higher z-order than) the 'X hrs remaining' text
Confirm the task name remains fully readable and not visually obstructed

requirements.description: Ensure wake time and sleep time have no visual fade and no configurable fade option
steps: Open the configure window
Verify no fade-related options exist for wake time or sleep time
Render the annulus with wake and sleep times visible
Inspect wake time boundary visually
Inspect sleep time boundary visually
Verify both boundaries are rendered with hard edges and no gradient or fade
Confirm wake and sleep rendering remains consistent regardless of other opacity or hover settings

requirements.description: Do not render tasks that fall partially or completely outside the wake-to-sleep time range
steps: Set wake time to 12:00 AM
Set sleep time to 3:00 PM
Create a task from 7:00 AM to 12:00 AM (out of wake range)
Render the annulus
Verify the task is not rendered on the ring
Verify there's is an exclamation error next to the task in the configure window
Confirm only tasks within the wake-to-sleep range are displayed

requirements.description: Auto-focus task name on new task creation and enable full keyboard tab navigation through task fields
steps: Open the configure window
Click the 'New Task' button
Verify the text cursor is focused in the task name input field
Press Tab and verify focus moves to start time hour field
Press Tab and verify focus moves to start time minutes field
Press Tab and verify focus moves to start time AM/PM field
Press Tab and verify focus moves to end time hour field
Press Tab and verify focus moves to end time minutes field
Press Tab and verify focus moves to end time AM/PM field
Press Tab again and verify focus moves to the next task entry
Press Shift+Tab and verify focus moves backward through the same fields in reverse order

requirements.description: Ensure current time text follows the current time radial line and is positioned nearby without overlapping, clipping, or colliding with other text
steps: Render the current time radial line with its associated time text
Simulate time progression so the radial line rotates
Verify the time text continuously follows the radial line
Ensure a small, consistent gap is maintained between the radial line and the time text
Dynamically reposition the time text to avoid overlapping other text elements
Verify the time text never clips or renders outside the app window
Confirm correct behavior through a full 360-degree rotation without tasks and with tasks (ensure no overlap of task name text and current time)

requirements.description: Place Skip button below Back button on the onboarding Support the Developer page
steps: Open onboarding flow
Navigate to the Support the Developer page
Verify the Skip button is positioned directly below the Back button

requirements.description: Ensure Support the Developer page fits without scrolling when opened from configure window
steps: Open the configure window (non-onboarding)
Navigate to the Support the Developer page
Verify all content fits within the window
Confirm no vertical or horizontal scrolling is required

requirements.description: Change 'X hrs remaining' text format to 'HH:MM remaining' without leading zeros for hours
steps: Change from the 'X hrs remaining' string format to 'HH:MM remaining'
Verify the countdown updates correctly in the new format as time passes

requirements.description: Remove Soft checkbox feature for tasks and disable all task blur or blend gradients
steps: Open the configure window
Locate the Soft checkbox for tasks
Remove the Soft checkbox from the UI
Render tasks on the annulus
Verify tasks have hard edges with no blur, fade, or blend gradients
Confirm task rendering is consistent regardless of hover or opacity settings
